author: Animalogic
description:
When a whale dies, life blooms. Their legacy is much more than money or fame, it's a testament to the intricate balance of the ocean. Let's explore the  fascinating process of a "whale fall" and its critical role in supporting diverse marine life. It highlights how these events contribute to a thriving deep-sea ecosystem, showcasing the enduring power of nature and the continuous cycle of ocean life. One single whale brings enough carbon and energy to the bottom of the ocean to feed animals for hundreds of years. Entire species have evolved to survive on dead whales. This is the amazing afterlife of the whale.

Special thanks to the Ocean Exploration Trust for their collaboration in the making of this video. Follow them here: 
24-hour a day live streaming from the deep sea www.NautilusLive.org

title: When a Whale Dies, This Ecosystem Comes Alive
